provenance.snippet: Lambda was founded in 2012 by published AI engineers. Lambda’s mission is to make compute as ubiquitous as electricity and give every person access to artificial intelligence. One person, one GPU. Trusted by the Fortune 500 Our Story Lambda was established to tackle the challenging task of teaching machines how to see and learn.

events.title: Lambda Announces Multibillion-Dollar Agreement With Microsoft
events.description: Lambda to deliver mission-critical AI cloud compute at scale under a multi-year contract.

provenance.snippet: Lambda announces a multibillion-dollar, multi-year agreement with Microsoft. products.name: AI Cloud Platform
products.description: Compute for training, fine-tuning & deploying Models and Agents, from the only Cloud solely focused on AI.

provenance.snippet: AI Cloud GPUs ready in minutes Compute for training, fine-tuning & deploying Models and Agents, from the only Cloud solely focused on AI. On-Demand instances GH200 as low as $1.49/hr 1-8 NVIDIA GPUs, pay-as-you-go, starting at $0.50/hr. Available in minutes.
Published on July 29, 2025 by Anket Sah Read More Recent Lambda Announces Multibillion-Dollar Agreement With Microsoft to Deploy AI Infrastructure Powered by Tens of Thousands of NVIDIA GPUs.
